description: Kitchener-Waterloo boasts a vibrant running community with various clubs catering to runners of all levels. The area features scenic trails, parks, and urban routes that provide excellent opportunities for both casual and competitive runners. Whether you're looking to improve your pace or simply enjoy a social run, there's a club for you.

runClubs.name: Waterloo Running Room
runClubs.location: Unit #3, 15 King Street South, Waterloo, ON N2J 1N9
runClubs.description: Offers group runs every Wednesday evening, catering to various paces and distances.

runClubs.name: Kitchener-Waterloo Runners
runClubs.location: Kitchener City Hall, 200 King St W, Kitchener, ON N2G 4G7
runClubs.description: A social running club that meets every Saturday morning for group runs of various distances.

runClubs.name: Guelph Running Club
runClubs.location: Various locations in Guelph and Kitchener-Waterloo area
runClubs.description: Hosts regular training sessions suitable for all levels, with a focus on community and support.

runClubs.name: Run For Fun Club
runClubs.description: A casual club focused on making running fun and social, meeting twice a week.

runClubs.name: Speed Demons Run Club
runClubs.description: An informal group that meets for speed workouts and interval training at various locations.
